text:
As per @CDCgov...

"You should not get vaccinated if you have had a severe allergic reaction or an immediate allergic reaction to any ingredient in an mRNA #COVID19 #vaccine. This includes allergic reactions to polyethylene glycol (PEG) and polysorbate."

https://t.co/x5y6CTnHAE https://t.co/DRo6ZWwcWh
